description.text: Service Pack 2 for Microsoft SQL Server 2014 upgraded all Microsoft SQL Server 2014 instances and components installed through the SQL Server setup.  Service Pack 2 can upgrade all editions of Microsoft SQL Server 2014 to Service Pack 2 level. For customers in need of additional installation options, please visit the Microsoft Download Center and download the Service Pack 2 Microsoft SQL Server 2014. To learn more about Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 please visit the Microsoft Support (http://support.microsoft.com) Knowledge Base article KB 3171021.
